questions.question: Batch process is preferred over continuous process, when the ?

answers.b: sales demand of product is not steady
answers.c: reactions are accompanied with release of energy

questions.question: In case of batch reactor ,the input and output terms of material balance equation are zero ?

answers.d: Not possible to calculate because of insufficient data

questions.question: The conversion of a reactant, undergoing a first-order reaction, at a time equal to three times the half life of the reaction is

answers.d: Not possible to calculate because of insufficient data
